room_title: Escape room "The Circus" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
room_address: 44325 W 12 Mile Ste H175 Novi, MI 48377
room_description: Uncle Tick-Tock has lost his magic. You and your party will be separated into two different parts of the circus to help Uncle Tick Tock restore his magic. Use your communication skills and restore harmony to this whacked out circus. You have exactly 60 minutes to work together and restore the circus or who knows what will happen.
